sources.title: Shadow Company | Full Movie | Action War Adventure | Robert Knepper
sources.description:
Shadow Company - A group of overseas Chinese in a foreign land defend the words "Chinese unity" with their lives. They stood up for their dignity when their loved ones were kidnapped. They never forget that they are descendants of Chinese and fight armed bandits and successfully rescue the kidnapped hostages.
2020.  Stars: Robert Knepper, Alberto Lancellotti, Tomer Oz

metadata.Plot: Thousands of private soldiers operate in Iraq alone... and many more around the world. These individuals, known as private security contractors, are changing the face of modern warfare everyday while their world has remained mystery to those at home. Shadow Company is the groundbreaking investigative feature-length documentary that seeks out and reveals the origins and destinations of these modern-day mercenaries. Who are these security contractors ? What do they do ? Why do they do it ? THE RULES OF WAR HAVE CHANGED. Purpose Films proudly brings you an immersive and visionary look at the private individuals who have changed them in a way that defies typical documentary style.
metadata.Actors: Alan Bell, Phil Lancaster, Madelaine Drohan
